```{r}
library(npmv)
```
```{r}
data("sberry",package="npmv")
```
```{r}
colnames(sberry)
```


```{r}
nonpartest(weight|bot|fungi|rating~treatment,sberry,permreps=1000)
```

```{r}
Skin_Melanoma_Real_transform <- as.data.frame(t(as.matrix(Skin_Melanoma_Real)))[c(3:106),]
Skin_Melanoma_Real_transform$treatment = 0
Skin_Melanoma_Real_transform <- as.data.frame(sapply(Skin_Melanoma_Real_transform, as.numeric))
```
```{r}
Skin_Melanoma_Simulated_transform <- as.data.frame(t(as.matrix(Skin_Melanoma_Simulated)))[c(3:202),]
Skin_Melanoma_Simulated_transform$treatment = 1
Skin_Melanoma_Simulated_transform <- as.data.frame(sapply(Skin_Melanoma_Simulated_transform, as.numeric))
```
```{r}
colnames(Skin_Melanoma_Simulated_transform)
```


```{r}
merge_df <- rbind(Skin_Melanoma_Simulated_transform, Skin_Melanoma_Real_transform)
```
```{r}
sapply(merge_df, class)
```

```{r}
nonpartest(V1|V2|V3|V4|V5|V6|V7|V8|V9|V10~treatment,data=merge_df,permreps=10000)
```
